name: Spintires
summary: Spintires is an off-roading simulation video game by UK-based developer Oovee Games. In Spintires, players take control of off-road vehicles and drive them through muddy off-road terrain to complete objectives. The game was released on June 13, 2014, and has since sold over one million copies. A spin-off game called Spintires: MudRunner was released on October 30, 2017.
info:
• 别名: 旋转轮胎
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2014年6月13日
  • 开发: Oovee Games
  • 发行: Oovee Games, IMGN
